vocabinfos.mediumDef:
A man living at the time of Divided Monarchy, first mentioned at 1Ki.22.26
§ Amon = "skilled workman" or "master workman"
1) a king of Judah, son of Manasseh
2) a governor of Samaria
3) a descendant of a servant of Solomon
vocabinfos._es_Definition: (1)   ¿artífice?; (2a)   hijo de Manasés; rey de Judá (643/42-641/40); (2b)   gobernador de Samaria; en tiempos de Ahab; (2c) אָמִי   jefe de familia; sirvientes de Salomón; post exílico; (2d)   deidad egipcia
vocabinfos._zh_tw_Definition:
亞們 这个陽性專有名詞在原文的意思是 "具有技能的工匠" 或 "熟練的工匠"
1) 一個猶大王, 瑪拿西之子
2) 一個撒馬利亞的官員
3) 一個所羅門僕人的後裔
vocabinfos._zh_Definition:
亚们 这个阳性专有名词在原文的意思是 "具有技能的工匠" 或 "熟练的工匠"
1) 一个犹大王, 玛拿西之子
2) 一个撒马利亚的官员
3) 一个所罗门仆人的后裔

vocabinfos.mediumDef:
A king of the tribe of Judah living at the time of Divided Monarchy, first mentioned at 2Ki.21.18;
son of: Manasseh (H4519H) and Meshullemeth (H4922); married to Jedidah (H3040);
father of: Josiah (H2977); also called Amos at Mat.1.10;
§ Amon = "skilled workman" or "master workman"
1) a king of Judah, son of Manasseh
2) a governor of Samaria
3) a descendant of a servant of Solomon

vocabinfos.mediumDef:
A man living at the time of Exile and Return, only mentioned at Ezr.2.57; also called Amon at Neh.7.59;
Another name of a.mi (אָמִי "Ami" H0532)
§ Amon = "skilled workman" or "master workman"
1) a king of Judah, son of Manasseh
2) a governor of Samaria
3) a descendant of a servant of Solomon
